TopicTitle: Your avatar is stuck in an elevator with the above poster's avatar, what do you do?

Articles.Content:
we are in "ise"

I-infinate

S-space

E-elevator

this explains why theres a floating sub in here and we are not crushed it also is why we move so slow
ok...(10char)
"That was easy to explain, I guess :P"
I start to act weirdly because you are attacking me.

Eats you ship.

(Mine is a very dark picture of kerbin)

*Comes back in the elevator*

"Waiiitttt.... Why is there now zero G? And why are we in space!?"
"Zero G? Weeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee

I say

just watched world war Z. pretty good movie except well it talks about rabies in Taiwan and well around the time the movie air there (this summer) there really were rabid dogs/animals there first time it's been there in about 10ish years... does this mean something?
"don't want to be hipster, but I prefered the book"
me too( really all his book are well written) because well it's a MOVIE of course he won't die

Oh my why is this elevator full of so many strange people

*Whimpers and hides in corner.*
"Don't be shy, Fluttershy :D"
Hey isn't this building only 300 floors?
"I don't think that we're still in a buiding"
"Don't know, but i am really hungry" ()
"take these blueberry muffins"
I would ask it where it is from
"A guy with funny eyes gave me these"
*pokes head*
*Blob "as you can see, im clairly not a vertebrate"
BLUE BERRY MUFFINS! Yay
The elevator explodes because the moon has been placed inside it.

we are in "ise"

this explains why theres a floating sub in here and we are not crushed it also is why we move so slow

"The elevator can fit the moon, a submarin and a big load of blue berry muffin and we can still being in it because it's infinite"
but where is the elevator going?
In that case, we have ponies on the moon. Unfortunately, I think ponies also need air to breathe. So there's that.
